summary.title: About me
summary.description: A self-motivated , creative and independent back end developer with 4+ years of professional experience in software analysis, design and development through efficient coding, feature optimization and relentless debugging. Highly motivated, detail-oriented with an ability to learn new frameworks and concepts quickly.

companyList.name: PayPal
description: Part of the IoT(HVAC System) team responsible for design and working in multiple components
Recently been member of Centre Of Excellence team
Leading a team of 3 members for building a new features
Have implemented numerous crucial design changes algorithmically
Took ownership for mentoring Junior developers, reviewing code from other developers, and suggesting improvements if any

companyList.name: OYO Rooms
description: Design and development efforts for Ceil Discount feature to cap the overall discount. Worked on building high throughput asynchronous write service

Design and development efforts for migration of existing coupon discounting system from a ROR based monolith to Java based micro-service with improved code and database design in order to achieve high performance in form of improved latency and stability of the system at a high
rate of throughput (JAVA/RUBY)
End to end integration of A/B service with discounting platform which resulted in significant increase of booking conversion (RUBY)
Developed partial discounting capability in discounting platform for use cases such as micro stay bookings (RUBY)
Build a panel for coupon pre-application to automate the manual process which saved engineering bandwidth

companyList.name: OYO Rooms
description: Built and deployed infrastructure for segmentation feature for discounting platform in order to optimise coupon discounting for larger set of users
Developed and deployed front end panel for internal use cases such as coupon creation, coupon edit, pre applied coupons listing using React and Redux front end technologies
